column1: 131kph, back of a length, shaping in, he mistimes a back foot drive to mid on
pulled powerfully wide of mid on! 131kph, chest high angled across, he swivelled and smacked it flat and hard into the gap and it races away
yorker, 133kph, he squeezes it out
good length, 135kph and it swings way wide of off
paddles a length ball over short fine! A length ball wide of off, Wade got inside the line early, set up for the paddle and just helped it on its way. It nearly went for six
driven on the up wide of mid off! 135kph, good length ball, not a half-volley, but he stood tall and thumped it wide of mid off
122kph, slower ball, good length on off, he adjusts and defends
95kph, good length, darted into off, he's back and working this to deep square leg
100kph, back of a length, angled into off, he's hurried pushing to cover
slog sweep over deep square! This was fuller in the arc, he got down on one knee early and launched it high over the fence at deep square
94kph, back of a length, fired into middle, he's back and tucking this behind square
fuller, 97kph, no real turn, he's back and working this to deep midwicket
94kph, angled into leg, back of a length, it comes off the thigh guard and rolls fine for a leg bye
smashed off the hip! What a pull shot! Fractionally short and Wade was all over it, swivelling to smash it behind square
134kph, back of a length wide of off, he gets a little close to it to cut, but drags it to mid on for a single
135kph, chest high short ball, he mistimes a pull to deep square leg
114kph, length slower ball, he thumps a cut shot straight to cover-point. Wade is flushing them
135kph, bouncer, too high and called wide. But a worthwhile delivery to get Wade off the front foot
118kph, slower ball, on off, he works this against the angle to long on
114kph, slower ball outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover
119kph, fired outside off, he slog sweeps, completely mistimes it forward of square but it runs away for four! This outfield is rapid and that leg side is short at this end for the left handers
cracking pull shot! 99kph, short ball, he's back in a flash and thumping it forward of square
shorter and quicker, he short arm jabs a pull shot to midwicket, he wants two but only gets one
drifting into leg, he gives room but mistimes a drive back to the bowler
he steps outside off to tru and paddle fine it comes off the glove and runs fine for a couple
cracked through cover-point! This was slower and shorter, he backs away to give room and places this superbly through cover-point. No one back on the off side
130kph, good length top of off, he's back and working this wide of mid on
132kph, back of a length on off, he is back and mistiming a drive to mid on

Great catch by Iyer at deep forward square. This was a head high short ball, D'Arcy Short pulled flat and hard, he nailed it, but hit it straight to the man and Iyer had to back track a touch, jump up and take the catch above his head. Good catch
beaten by a 121kph, slower ball, it gripped off a length and beat the edge
130kph, back of a length, fourth stump line, he defends to cover-point
120kph slower ball wide of off, he square drives on the up but straight to point
mowed over midwicket! 110kph, off cutter slower ball, it just sits up off a length and Wade smokes it over midwicket with a cross batted swipe
Pandya drops him at deep midwicket! He was perfectly placed, Wade flushes a pull shot flat to Pandya, he runs to his right reaches up but spills it, and it bounces over the rope
good bouncer outside off, he drops the knees and sways inside it
lofted over cover! Slower ball wide half volley, he spotted it, opened the chest and sliced it up and over cover
140kph, length ball, he tries to pull but is hurried, he miscues to mid on
113kph, length slower ball, it stays low, he pulls but straight to midwicket
128kph, back of a length outside off, he stands tall and punches this to the gap at cover-point
short and wide and hammered through cover-point! 50 for Wade off just 25 balls. His second T20I half-century. Exceptional striking
117kph, slower ball outside off, he pushes a drive to mid off

an appeal for lbw given not out and India review. Slower ball back of a length, he tried to heave over square leg, it gets hit in the box! No bat involved. Ball tracking has it just going over the bails. Not out remains. India lose the review
full down the leg side, and called wide
fuller on middle, he works this through midwicket
121kph, short slower ball outside off, he pulls off a bottom edge behind square
97kph, sliding on from back of a length, he's hurried pulling to deep midwicket
99kph, short length wide of off, he backs away and cuts to deep point
100kph, length ball, he's back and mistiming a pull through midwicket for a couple
he gets down on one too early, Sundar slows it up to 86kph, but he manages to place an awkward sweep to the gap at deep midwicket for two
shorter length, he's back and slapping this straight to the bowler
84kph tossed way wide of off and it's too wide

Wade is run out after Kohli drops the easiest catch you will ever see! Wade charged to a length ball, got a leading edge, it ballooned to cover, Kohli took two bites at it and spilled it. No idea how. It was a lollypop, but Wade had run and Smith didn't, Kohli picked up his mess and threw to Rahul to run him out by miles!
length ball on leg, he's back and tucking this to midwicket
129kph, full on leg, he clips this through midwicket to the sweeper
131kph, full on leg, he whips this firmly to deep midwicket
120kph, length slower ball, he got back to heave over the short boundary, got it off the toe end and it rolls away for a single
121kph, length slower ball, he drives on the up to long off
133kph, full on off, he slices a drive to deep point
87kph, leg break outside off, he tries to cut but it slides on and Maxwell misses
lofted over long off! He took on the man on the rope lofting this high to long on and it cleared him and landed in the crowd
88kph, back of a length on middle, he's back and working this slowly to the circle at mid on and immediately calls two. Good placement and running
full on leg, he sweeps to deep backward square
86kph, shorter leg break, he's back and working to deep midwicket
89kph, attempted switch hit, it's fired down leg, but because he switched it's not a wide. Well bowled
short of a length and into the pads. Smith shuffles and gently nudges that past short fine off the inside of his bat. To the left of that fielder and quickly into the backward square boundary
short of a length at off stump, defended off the back foot
slower short ball outside off, pulled firmly to deep midwicket
yorker and just outside off. Clears the front leg and jabs it to sweeper's right
short of a length and just outside off, stabbed to backward point off the back foot
short and wide outside off, reaches out and chops that to sweeper's left
thick outside edge dribbles to short third man's left. Beautiful legbreak that, spinning away from middle and catching Smith on the back foot with an angled bat
short of a length and on leg stump, steps out and is beaten in flight. Cops that on the thigh as he looks to close the face on it
length at leg stump, steps out and drives to long-on

swatted over deep midwicket. That's come off the low part of the bat. A short ball sitting up at middle stump, backs away hurriedly and goes full tilt with the swing. Slightly early through the shot as it turns, but he beats Iyer's leap
good length on leg stump, hangs deep and swipes firmly across the line. Iyer picks up on the bounce to his right at deep midwicket
good length and dipping at off stump, beats him in flight as he steps out again. Wants to loft that over extra cover. It ends up at long-off
scoops to fine leg. Good length ball in the corridor. Smith had pre-meditated. Quickly down on his knee and nice execution as he gets his weight into the off side. Fine leg was inside
short of a length this time, angled into off stump. Smiths walks into the off side this time and steers this to deep backward square as it rises off the pitch
length and wide outside off, slashed out to sweeper cover

sliced to backward point. A knuckle ball gets Maxwell. Floated at a length and wide outside off. He's down on his knee after backing away, trying to slap that over extra cover. He's gotten too far leg side to make good connection. Forced to reach out and a simple catch for Sundar
low full toss outside off, driven to sweeper cover
full and just outside off. Mistimed drive turns into a useful chip over the bowler and two to long-off's right
short and wide and sliding on outside off, beaten on the cut
short and turning into the corridor. Loses the room for a cut shot and this trickles into the off side
pulled firmly back, and that might have carried to Sundar. Will have to get a closer look. It was short of a length and turning in and he pulled it towards long-on. Sundar only managed to deflect it
length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
short outside off, punched to sweeper cover
short of a length and pushed through flat at middle stump. Watchfully tucked to deep midwicket off the back foot
low full toss at leg stump, flicked to square leg's left
full slower ball in the corridor, gets down for the sweep and is beaten
low full toss at leg stump, shuffles and looks to tickle that fine. Can't get it past KL Rahul down leg side
slower ball, short of a length and pushed across off stump. Looks to lace that through the leg side off the back foot, it ends up pitch side on the off via the inside edge and his front pad
low full toss at off stump, flicked to long-on's right
full on off stump, shuffles and flicks to deep midwicket
googly on off stump, driven to long-off
dragged over long-on! Good length, dipping own at leg stump. Doesn't quite get to the pitch of this but swings neatly across it as it turns away. Beats long-on easily to his left
good length at middle stump, backs away to punch through the off side. Gets a thick inside edge into midwicket
good length and sliding on at off stump. Steps out and punches to long-off

Smith is beaten and so it Rahul. Switches very very early to left-handed. Chahal pushes it wide down leg - perhaps an offside wide for a left-hander too. Rahul can't get to that as it stays low and slides away
carted over deep backward square. Sweet hit, this! Good length and just outside off. Jumps into line and gets on a knee. Rotates his body as he swats this
off the pad and past off stump. Good length, sliding on at leg stump. Steps out and is beaten as he looks for the flick
slower ball at a length outside off. Knuckle ball. Miscues the slog and it plonks and turns to the left of Samson running in from long-on
leading edge but safe. Full and outside off. Walks into line and looks to turn it behind square, but that's also a knuckle ball that grips in the pitch
Slower wide ball outside off, inside edge onto back leg as he tries to bludgeon that over extra cover and falls over
full and just outside off, looks to carve through cover, that rolls back to the bowler
slower short ball outside off, pulled laboriously to long-on's right
full on leg stump, swept along the floor to deep square's right
full outside off, driven along the ground to long-off
good length and pushed wide outside off, backs away too far into the leg side and can't get a shot away
lofted straight over the bowler. Good length and dipping on middle stump. Not to the pitch of this but goes through with quick hands

Pandya takes it at long-off on the third attempt! Good length, backs away and slaps it aerially, inside out. Decently struck. Pandya sprints to his left, and it pops out of his hand. He continues running to his left and the ball follows, on momentum. Pops out again on the second attempt before he gathers himself and takes it comfortably
good length at leg stump, miscued sweep to deep midwicket
full at off stump, backs away and drills to long-off
low full toss outside off, waits on that and looks to punch past extra cover with a straight bat. Thakur dives to the left and stops

Henriques reviews a catch behind. Given very late by the umpire, presumably because India were celebrating before they appealed. It's a cutter in the corridor. He was looking to slap that over the leg side. There's nothing on the thermal images, but Snicko has a murmur as the ball is adjacent to the bat. The decision will be upheld
India think of the lbw review but decide against it. It's a low full toss slamming his front pad as he looks to whip into the leg side. Perhaps slightly outside leg
slower ball at a length at off stump, dropped into the covers with soft hands
chopped firmly to sweeper's right. Slower short ball, sits up nicely and he gets this with a two-handed forehand well in front of square

Pandya over-runs but manages to stop to his left. Slower ball, short of a length outside off. Looks to make room for the cut through the off side. Deceived by it and it trickles and turns away from Pandya at long-off
trickles through to the keeper. Slower bouncer outside off. Shuffles for the hook, only gets a glove on it
sliced over point and sweeper has to sprint a long way to his left to stop. It's full and just outside off - in the slot, really. Clears the front leg and has a hack but miscues that one
full slower ball outside off, clears the front leg and drills it firmly to long-off's left. Pandya with the sprint again and can't collect cleanly

chopped over the point boundary. Smart batting. Waited on the slower ball this time as he backed away. Chahar attempting another slower bouncer. Allows Stoinis to wait and wait before nailing the cnnection

lands between short fine and deep square who are converging. Miscued pick-up shot at this length ball on the pads goes high but lands safely - for Stoins, that is. The fielders were briefly in danger of a collision
good length swinging back into the right hander and it hits the thigh guard
beaten by one angled across. Good length, scrambled seam, nips away as he drives
short and wider, he's back and late cutting through backward point, Rahul slipped slightly turning for two but he made it
back of a length, fifth stump line, he defends to gully and Dhawan turns down the single
cut in the air through a vacant gully, third man is up, deep point needs to chase and Abbott cuts this off
full and shaping into middle, he works this to midwicket for a single
full angled into off, he mistimes a drive to mid off who is deep on the circle
good length, fourth stump line, he square drives on the up to point
good length, angled across, he drives on the up and gets a thick edge that flies to third man
short and wide, he lashes a cut hard to deep backward point who is placed for that specific shot
full and wide, he hammers a drive straight to cover-point
back of a length, wide of off, he square drives to the deep point

an appeal for lbw given not out. Wade says it's worth a look. Tye was unsure. But Wade reviews. He was hit on the back leg trying to flick over square. No bat. It was pitching outside leg. It was very tight. Part of the ball was in line but not enough. That's why Tye wasn't interested. Australia lose the review.
another lbw appeal again turned down by Paul Wilson. No review. This nipped back of the seam at 140kph. It hit the back leg but might have been doing too much
full toss, knee high, 144kph, he miscues over midwicket for a couple
he over-steps. It was a good length outside off and Rahul missed trying to heave over midwicket
launched over cover! What a shot. Full outside off, he set himself and crushed it over the long boundary at cover. That was in the slot
short and wide, he's back and cutting to deep backward point
charges and gets a thick edge that flies fine of short third man! He danced down to drive and gets a thick edge but gets away with it
swept up and just over short fine leg! Pitching way outside leg, he swept hard, just lifting it up and over short fine
a clever lap sweep very fine, it was angled into the pads, he stepped inside the line to flick it fine and Dhawan runs really well
slog sweep over midwicket! That was a powerful strike to the short boundary. Drifting into his arc and he crushed it flat into the crowd
threaded between short third man and backward point! Fractionally short and wide, he's back and placing it perfectly between the pair behind point
good length off break, he gets a bottom edge trying to cut again and gets a single
darted into leg, he's back and whipping this to deep midwicket
square drive off the front foot forward of point! Too much width, there is a deep backward point but he crushed it forward of point with sensational timing
better length, wide of off, he square drives on the up with control to deep backward point
good length, top of off, he defends with soft hands to drop it into the off side for an easy single
wide half-volley, he mistimes a drive to cover
thick inside edge just past off stump. He tried to on the up but his footwork wasn't as assured, it missed the stumps and they get one
charges and launches over midwicket! It was a decent length delivery and Dhawan advanced to get to the length and lofted it over deep midwicket. Terrific shot
138kph, back of a length on off, he gets a leading edge trying to work to leg but it flies safely to short third man

caught at deep point! Tye goes with the 118kph knuckle ball and deceives Rahul. It was fuller outside off, he tried to loft over cover-point but got under it too much, it went a long way in the air but Swepson held his nerve on the rope and took a good catch
140kph, good length angled across, he tries to cut but plays over the top of it
140kph, too full and wide, he leans on a glorious square drive. Didn't over hit it, just placed it into the gap
123kph, good length on middle, he works this to forward square
141kph, back of a length outside off, he leans back and guides this to backward point
87kph, leg break full outside off, he drives to deep cover-point
nearly chopped on. He went back to a leg break, defended but it bounced behind him and just missed the stumps
pushed through on off, he is back and defending again
88kph, top spinner, he sweeps infront of square
full leg break, he drives to long off
92kph, quicker leg break on middle, he works this to midwicket for a single
125kph, shorter length, he's back and pulling behind square to the man in the deep
123kph, short into the hip, he pulls behind square to the sweeper
brilliant late cut! He stepped outside off early, Henriques spotted it and pushed it wide and Dhawan adjusted to slap it behind point
full and wide, he mistimes a drive to cover
115kph slower ball yorker, he jams this out to midwicket
113kph, slower ball on leg, he works this through square leg with ease to the gap and gets two
89kph leg break outside off, he mistimes to cover
93kph, short leg break, he pulls through square leg for a couple
87kph, shorter length, he charges early, and has to just clip this to deep midwicket
fuller slider, he's caught on the crease defending
full outside off, he hammers a drive to deep cover

Appeal for a stumping and they check with the TV umpire. 91kph, wide wrong un, he missed trying to cut but it wasn't called. He just lifted his foot for a moment in the crease and Wade whipped the bails off as he did but he just got his foot down in time. And it is called wide after the not out call from the 3rd umpire
91kph full down leg, he tickles this fine with the turn and it's a long chase for Abbott. They runs well for three
tossed up outside off, he tries to slog sweep but drags a bottom edge to short fine
quicker on middle, he slog sweeps, dragging it behind square
shorter leg break, he's back and punching this to long on
90kph, shorter wrong un, he cuts straight to backward point for a single only
92kph, top spinner, some extra bounce and mistimes a cut to deep point
short ball, on off, he pulls to deep midwicket
full at off stump, down quickly to sweep along the floor to deep square's right
googly, short of a length at middle stump. Backs away and cuts to cover
full and just outside off, drilled firmly to extra cove's left. Smith puts in a slide at long-off though, running to his right. One-handed. Saves two
full at off stump, gets forward and looks to flick. Inside edge onto pad but that brings up his fifty
short of a length on middle, whipped to deep square
short of a length and following him down leg side. A laboured pull, not connected too well, but the longer boundary means that is two
good length and sliding on at middle stump. Steps out and looks to drive through the off side. It comes off the inside half and sprints down to long-on
taken at deep square! Good length at middle stump, dipping as Dhawan gets down for the slog sweep. It gets big on him and he follows it with his hands. Manages only to loft it gently for the fielder
short of a length and sliding into off stump. Punched to sweeper's left
googly, full outside off. Drilled sweetly and flat at long-off. Falls short of Smith who says he couldn't spot it

just, how? Good length, beats him in flight, grips and turns, He's stepped out to play the lofted drive, he checks it at the last moment, but has got it to sweeper's right from an almost back foot position
short of a length at middle stump, whipped firmly to deep square's left
short of a length at off stump, mistimed pull to midwicket
slower ball at a length outside off, reaches out and slices to sweeper's left
incredible bat speed. Slower ball, short of a length and across him. Waits perfectly on that and still manages to get a good swing through the line of this. Slashed past point
beauty. A languid pull of the highest quality, bang off the middle of the bat. It's a short one at his ribs. He's on his front foot and swivels to swipe this over deep square
full outside off, looks to drive but is deceived. Trickles into the off side
full at off stump, driven down to long-off
good length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket off the back foot
full and sliding in at middle stump. Looks to jab through cover but that slides onto his inside edge
slapped out to long-off. Short of a length and flatter outside off. Steps out and is beaten in flight. But manages to get good angled bat on this. But not enough elevation
full at middle stump, leans in and flicks to long-on's right
good length and turning away from off, punched on the rise to sweeper cover
yorker at off stump. Opens the face and jabs this into the covers
placed perfectly. Short at middle stump, shuffles and meets this in front of his eyes. Gets it between long leg and deep square
yorker dipping into the corridor. Backs away and looks to chop through point. Beaten
he's scooped it! This is rare. And effective. fine leg is very wide. This is a full one outside off, Kohli gets down and tumbles into the off side as he meets it perfectly
slower ball at a length and very wide outside off
outside edge past short third. Slower ball, full and outside off. Reaches out for the drive as it gets big on him
yorker wide outside off, jams it to sweeper's left
length and sliding on outside off. Looks to drive, it comes off the inside half and ends up at long-off
whipped to deep midwicket's right off the back foot, that hurried him
good length and into the pads. Slugs that wide of deep midwicket
quicker one, just short of yorker length. Clears the front leg and drills it past the bowler's right hand
full outisde off, leans in and flicks with soft hands to steal two from deep midwicket
short of a length on off stump, on the back foot to punch to deep midwicket's left

outside edge is taken! Short and wide outside off. Steps out and chucks his hands at that. It was very wide. He had to reach out to make connection. Comes off the outside edge of the low part of the bat. Loops above Wade who times the jump well
full slower ball at leg stump, flicked to deep square's right
slower ball, short and wide outside off. Cut firmly to sweeper's left
short and wide, sliding across off stump. And hurries him and beats his cut
slower ball, good length and wide outside off. Shuffles across and slaps this to sweeper's right
<b>chopped past short third man.<.b> Yorker wide outside off, jumps back in the crease and chops down on that. It's off the outside part of the bat and quickly past the fielder
full and at leg stump. Backs away and looks to loft this straight. Comes off the thick outside edge and lands safely to long-off's left
googly at a length on leg stump, through his attempted slog too early. Gets an inside edge to short fine
Wade reviews for lbw. A quicker one slides rapidly onto Pandya's pads in front of leg stump. But there looked to be an inside edge as he looked to whip it through. Hotspot confirms it

a no-look slog wayyyyy over deep midwicket! Full and sliding onto his front leg. He gets to the pitch, watches the ball onto the bat and continues to watch that spot as his perfect bat swing sends this a long way
short at off stump, cuts straight to backward point
short and wide outside off, waits on it this time and chops that between cover and point
Iyer takes on long-on's arm and finishes the second. Full slower ball at off stump, drilled to long-on's left
slower ball, short of a length and wide outside off. Beaten on the attempted cut
<b>beaten again.<b/> Full slower ball wide outside off this time, shuffles and scythes and misses
sliced over short third. Full toss outside off. Throws his hands at that. The bat turns in the hand and it flies off the outside half of the bat

drilled to sweeper's right. Good length and wide outside off, backs away and throws his hands at it again. Bat turns in the hands again, but this time he's in more control as he gets it in front of sweeper
short of a length and wide outside off. Cut straight to backward point, who might have got Pandya at the non-strikers with a direct hit
slower ball, sliding into the body. Swishes across it, gets a thick inside edge to deep square leg's right
pumps that wide of long-on! He continues to stay around the wicket. And slides this length ball into Pandya's arc. He nails it on the up
beaten with a smart bouncer. Follows him down leg side. He looks to improvise with the upper cut but that's past him

slogs it well over deep midwicket! Full and angled into the arc once again from around the wicket. He set up for it, picked that it was back of the hand, and swung cleanly through it. Wins India the series
